extendedInfo.description: Get this app for free! At ConstructionKnowledge.net, our resource for learning about construction, sign up for the newsletter or like us on Facebook. Then shoot us an email so we can refund your purchase.Steel Beam Design for Construction:An easy to use steel beam design calculator for construction & building.Inputs:span, beam size, steel shape & size. Properties of US hot rolled steel beams included. An option of point load or uniformly distributed load (only simple beam spans included).Outputs:calculated stress in bending, the allowable stress of your beam type and the calculated and allowed deflection.ConstructionKnowledge.net:These apps our part of our mission at ConstructionKnowledge.net to help those in construction to learn and rise in this crazy world of construction. Please send us your ideas for apps, suggestions for new web content and follow our blog. It's Ned's fun and informative take on the construction industry.

reviews.title: Overall great but....
reviews.comment: Overall I liked the app.  It was simple to use but I do wish that the results at the end also included the beam that was selected.  That one flaw makes it quite annoying for me to use.
reviews.author: Michael Verrastro

reviews.comment: Nice simple app. Would give 5 stars if it could figure cantilevers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant just what I have been looking for, missed one star as it doesn\'t have metric input
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Let\'s me quickly check a steel beam sizing in the field. Only has simple loadings but that\'s ok since it\'s so easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Helps me for quick steel beam calcs. Just the right amount of options
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Refund pls
reviews.comment: Hi. Id like to request for a refund pls. Other than that, tis such an awesome app!
reviews.author: Paul M.
